function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Occupant behavior impacting indoor environment and disease transmission routes in buildings.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and reduced effectiveness of facility management interventions.","Mitigation":"Education and training of occupants on infection control measures, behavioral changes, and adherence to guidelines.","Technologies":"Smart sensors for monitoring indoor air quality and occupancy.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and public health officials.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of occupant behaviors and their impact on disease transmission routes.","Impact":"Inability to establish accurate parameters for assessing infection risks at a building level.","Mitigation":"Conducting research to understand occupant behaviors for each transmission route and establishing robust parameters for infection risk assessment.","Technologies":"Occupancy tracking systems and indoor air quality monitoring devices.","People":"Research institutions, building designers, and public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Psychological factors influencing occupant behaviors related to disease transmission.","Impact":"Reduced compliance with infection control measures and increased risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Psychological interventions, counseling, and mental health support for building occupants.","Technologies":"Online mental health support platforms and digital counseling services.","People":"Building occupants, mental health professionals, and public health officials.","Owner":"Public health organizations and mental health support providers."}]}
